title: Aston Villa: Jonathan Kodjia joins Qatari side Al-Gharafa - BBC Sport
snippet: Aston Villa and Ivory Coast striker Jonathan Kodjia joins Qatari side Al-Gharafa on a two-and-a-half year deal.

title: Jonathan Kodjia - Wikipedia
snippet: On 19 January 2020, Kodjia was presented to the media by Al-Gharafa in the Qatar Stars League, coached by former Premier League manager Slaviša Jokanović.

title: Transferts : Jonathan Kodjia quitte Aston Villa pour Al-Gharafa (Foot)
snippet: Ancien joueur de Reims, Amiens ou encore Angers, Jonathan Kodjia a été vendu par Aston Villa à Al-Gharafa.

title: Jonathan Kodjia
snippet: On 20 January 2020, Jonathan Kodjia transferred to Al-Gharafa in the Qatar Stars League from Aston Villa for a fee of €3 million, signing a two-and-a-half-year contract.[40] He made his debut three days later, scoring a hat-trick in a 4–2 ...
